page.title: 17TRANSPORT IN EXMOUTH
page.content: {Cars The{Nova}is now the car that sells most in Exmouth.The {Nova}comes from Spain.{Vauxhall}make the {Nova.}The prices of second hand cars are around Â£2000. The average family has{one {car.} {Buses } There are two{bus services}in Exmouth.{Buses}are not used as often as they used to be{because most people {have cars.}A{double decker}bus can go{ {12 miles per gallon of diesel}where a {single decker}can go{16 miles to a {gallon. {Docks The {Docks}in Exmouth are very busy.It has room for{6 ships},{5 in {the actual Dock and 1 on the pier.} Products imported are{chipboard,animal {feed and coal. Scrap metal}is exported.
